alert.note: Alert for Vilas (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 05 at 10:58AM CST until January 05 at 6:00PM CST by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...SNOW AND BECOMING BLUSTERY TODAY... .Low pressure system will continue to track across northern Lower Michigan this afternoon. Periods of snow generated by the system will continue throughout the day. Gusty winds will result in some blowing and drifting snow at times this afternoon. The snow will make travel difficult. ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulation of 1 to 3 inches by evening. * WHERE...Vilas County. * WHEN...Until 6 PM CST this evening. * IMPACTS...Travel may be difficult at times. Blowing and drifting snow could reduce the visibility in open areas this afternoon.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
